ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And We gave him the good news of a forbearing boy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We gave him the good news of a clement son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (In response to this prayer) We gave him the good news of a prudent boy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave him the glad news of the birth of a forbearing son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore gave him the glad tidings of an intelligent son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, We gave him the glad tidings of a forbearing boy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We gave him the good news of a boy, possessing forbearance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We gave him the good tidings of a prudent boy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So We gave him tidings of a gentle son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave him the good news that he would have a patient, forbearing son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore We gave him the glad tidings of a boy gentle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We gave him the good news of a forbearing son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We gave him the good news of a boy ready to suffer and forbear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We gave him the glad tidings of a forbearing boy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And We gave him the glad tidings of a very gentle son (Ishmael).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We gave him good news of a clement boy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:101] So We gave him the good tidings of a forbearing son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So We gave him tidings of a gentle son) a son who is knowledgeable in his youth, gentle in his old age.
